data.title: How to watch men‚Äôs soccer gold medal match at the 2024 Paris Olympics: TV schedule, live streams, Peacock, NBC, start times, top athletes, preview
data.meta_description: Watch the Olympic men‚Äôs soccer gold medal final match live today at the 2024 Paris Olympics on NBC and Peacock, with full TV schedule and live streaming information plus info on top athletes and competition previews.
data.text:
The complete soccer schedule, including TV listings, is also available on the NBCOlympics.com schedule page.

All live streams are also available to watch on mobile, tablet and connected TV devices via the Peacock, NBC and NBC Olympics apps.

Men's Soccer: Gold Medal Match Schedule

(all times Eastern, subject to change) DATE/TIME EVENT STREAM Fri, 8/9

12-3:30p Men's Gold Final üèÖ: France vs. Spain Peacock, NBCOlympics.com

You can watch every event at the 2024 Paris Olympics LIVE by subscribing to Peacock. After subscribing and logging in, either go to PeacockTV.com/Olympics in your web browser or download the Peacock app to your phone, tablet, or connected TV device and navigate to the Olympics section.

Users can also authenticate with their cable subscription, which allows them to watch live streams of every Olympic event on NBCOlympics.com, NBC.com, the NBC app or the NBC Olympics app. All streams can be viewed in your web browser or on your phone, tablet or connected TV device.

If you missed any of the live action, you can catch up by watching the full event replay on the NBCOlympics.com Replays hub. The stream links above will also take you directly to the full replay of each live stream.

Host nation France enters the gold medal match as the heavy favorite after an undefeated run in the tournament so far. The French, known for scoring often and defending hard, have given up just one goal in their five contests and notched 11 of their own. Either way, it will be the country's first Olympic soccer medal since winning gold in 1984.
